> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9XAE7EGE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-09T19:25:35.537+0000)
>
> Read the person who isn't connected's name.

but... that's not irony
For those who are confused on irony, it would be irony if his name was "i never dc" or "first to load".

Coincidental humor =/= irony.

Irony requires contradiction of expectation.

It would be ironic if his name was IneverDC
Irony names are the best names
I love it when you get names like that. XD
